Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.model

Class PlayState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.model.PlayState
public class PlayState extends Object
Class which saves the state of the game in client. Server sends status messages to the client which, via PlayMessageController, change this class. Then the state can be read from this class to update the view.
